segments.advisor_message: I’d like to discuss your retirement aspirations. What kind of lifestyle do you envision for your retirement?
segments.client_message: Oh, well, you know, I really hope to travel a lot, like, visiting places I’ve never been to. Ideally, I’d love to, um, spend some time in Europe and maybe also explore some national parks here in the U.S.

segments.advisor_message: That sounds wonderful. Do you have any specific financial investments in mind to help fund those plans?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I guess I should probably consider something like, um, an ISA or maybe even a GIA? I’ve got some savings in a bank account too, but it, you know, doesn’t seem like enough if I really want to enjoy my retirement.
